Pre-Game Insights: England and Scotland have never played a T20I against each other.
England will return to Bridgetown, the venue of their first ICC trophy win in 2010.
England are defending champions but have struggled in recent T20 World Cup matches.
Scotland qualified for the tournament after acing the regional European Qualifiers.
Scotland have a history of performing better when batting first.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be Scotland's first T20I in the Caribbean.
Scotland have bowled first in just three of their 17 T20Is since January 2022, and each of their 10 wins in this period have come while batting first.
